channel.title: The Broo View
channel.description: Cincinnati's legendary sportscaster offers his unique views on the world of sports. With interviews, opinions and more.
channel.itunes:author: Ken Broo
channel.itunes:subtitle: Cincinnati's legendary sportscaster offers his unique views on the world of sports. With interviews, opinions and more.
channel.itunes:keywords: Reds, Bengals, Cincinnati, NFL, MLB, UC, Xavier, NHL, NBA, sports

item.title: The Broo View Episode 244
item.description: In this episode, Ken is joined by sports memorabilia collector, Bill Schubert, who says he has a bat that once belonged to Pete Rose and says that the bat is corked.
item.itunes:author: Ken Broo

item.title: The Broo View Episode 243
item.description: In this episode, Ken is tackling two topics. One is that imperfect perfect game and whether or not Bud Selig should have overturned umpire Jim Joyce's ruling. Denny Knobler, the national writer from cbssports.com joins Ken to discuss that. Also, the landscape of college football is about to change forever. Joining Ken later in this episode is Pete Fiutak, the national writer for College Football News
item.itunes:author: Ken Broo

item.title: The Broo Viw Episode 242
item.description: In this episode, Ken talks about the red hot start of the Cincinnati Reds with USA Today national baseball writer, Bob Nightengale. Also, with the World Cup starting in just a few days, Ken gets the latest odds on who'll win, who'll be the Cup MVP and which teams are the most likely to get into on field fights from Damon Durante of BetUS.com. For the best in sports, check out Ken's web site: www.kenbroo.com
item.itunes:author: Ken Broo

item.title: The Broo View Episode 241
item.description: In this episode, Ken is joined by Jack Bechta, player agent and columnist for the www.nationalfootballpost.com Jack has a startling stat: 75% of all NFL players are broke 3-5 years after leaving the game. Get the best in sports on Ken's web site: www.kenbroo.com
item.itunes:author: Ken Broo

item.title: The Broo View Episode 240
item.description: In this episode, Ken Is joined by Tom Deinhart from www.rivals.com. Tom and Ken discuss the changing landscape of college football and how the Big 10's expansion plans could affect schools like the University of Cincinnati. For the best in sports, check out Ken's website: www.kenbroo.com
item.itunes:author: Ken Broo

item.title: The Broo View Episode 239
item.description: In this episode, Ken is joined by Michael Lombardi of the NFL Network and www.nationalfootballpost.com to disucss the Bengals recent signing of Pacman Jones. For the best in sports, visit Ken's web site: wwww.kenbroo.com
item.itunes:author: Ken Broo

item.title: The Broo View Episode 238
item.description: In this episode, Ken is joined by Joe Lemire from sportsillustrated.com to discuss the recent suspension of Cincinnati Reds pitcher, Edinson Volquez for performance enhancing drugs. For the best in sports coverage, check out www.kenbroo.com
item.itunes:author: Ken Broo

item.title: The Broo View Episode 237
item.description: In this episode, Ken talks baseball with The Hit King, Pete Rose. Among the topics, what to do about Aaron Harang and Aroldis Chapman's 102 mph fastball. For the best in sports, check out www.kenbroo.com
item.itunes:author: Ken Broo

item.title: The Broo View Episode 236
item.description: In this episode, Ken is joined by Hub Arkush, the editor and publisher of Pro Football Weekly. Hub offers his insight into the upcoming 2010 NFL Player Draft. More great interviews can be found at www.kenbroo.com
item.itunes:author: Ken Broo

item.title: The Broo View Episode 235
item.description: In this episode, Ken talks NFL draft with wwww.draftinsiders.com guhru Frank Coyle. Who gets picked and where, the predictions are right here.
item.itunes:author: Ken Broo

item.title: The Broo View Episode 234
item.description: In this episode, Ken is joined by Wes Bunting, from the nationalfootballpost.com. Ken and Wes discuss the upcoming NFL Combine.
item.itunes:author: Ken Broo

item.title: The Broo View Episode 233
item.description: In this episode, Ken is joined by Ken Rosenthal, national baseball writer with foxsports.com and part of the Fox MLB game of the week crew. The discussion is whether or not the Reds can contend in 2010.
item.itunes:author: Ken Broo

item.title: The Broo View Episode 232
item.description: In this episode, Ken talks with The Sporting News college football recruiting expert, Brian McLaughlin about national letter of intent signing day
item.itunes:author: Ken Broo

item.title: The Broo View Episode 231
item.description: In this episode, Matt Bowen from nationalfootballpost.com joins Ken to talk about how far away the Bengals are from having a team that can play in a Super Bowl.
item.itunes:author: Ken Broo

item.title: The Broo View Episode 230
item.description: In this episode, Ken is joined by Dan Wetzel, from yahoosports.com, and the topic is how the President of the United States can immediately bring a playoff system to Division I college football
item.itunes:author: Ken Broo
